pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṃghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.3: So tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṃghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṃghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.5: Atha kho so upāsako saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:6.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:7.2: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho kathinaṃ uddhareyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:8.3: Yassāyasmato khamati kathinassa uddhāro, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:9.1: Ubbhataṃ saṃghena kathinaṃ, khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.1: Atha kho so upāsako bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.4: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:10.5: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ na dassantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.4: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:11.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:12.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:13.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:15.2: “kathaṃ idaṃ kathinaṃ na uddhareyyā”ti paṭibāhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
